author: BusinessToday.In
title: Jeff Bezos' fortune hits record $211 bn, and the reason is Pentagon!
description: Pentagon said on Tuesday that it was cancelling a $10 billion cloud-computing contract awarded to Microsoft in 2010 after many years of squabbling between the government and some of the biggest US tech giants over the deal
